column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Katherine - Thanks for your review. I'm sorry you were not happy with your takeout order. I must be honest
column2: serving (or eating) our ramen from a container is definitely not the optimal method. True ramen
column4: is best served from the broth pot as soon as possible. But
column5: our customers have demonstrated demand for takeout ramen so we must comply. Ironically
column6: I'd guess many of our customers were first introduced to ramen from the styrofoam cup o' Noodles.
